DataElement.preferredName: Target Lesion Percent Change From Baseline in Sum of Diameter Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the sum of diameter size percentage change on target lesions compared to baseline.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Target Lesion Percent Change From Baseline in Sum of Diameter
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination._A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._The most recently recorded sum of diameters minus the baseline sum of diameters divided by the baseline sum of diameters, multiplied by 100.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The goal intended to be attained.:(LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: An object fixed as a goal or point of examination; something to point at; a destination.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
